name: Harvestein
description:
---------STORY---------

Marcus was known as a rich businessman. He wanted to become an ultimate human so he experimented with changing his limbs. Thats where his nickname "Harvestein" came from. Unfortunately for him, one experiment went wrong and he was left limbless lying on the floor.

 

You must take the role of a surgeon and help Marcus find all limbs he needs. Be careful,  Marcus has a bad reputation in the town so people might not like what you are doing for him.

---------CONTROLS---------

WASD/Arrows - Movement

Mouse - Interact with limbs

Dragging limbs will tear them from the body

Clicking on a limb that is no longer attached will add it to organ box (inventory)

E - Interact with marcus
